author: @croatoansounds
text: So what happened with the suit, since we are a little over a year on?

replies.author: @petercarioscia9189
replies.text:
Here is the play by play, https://www.courtlistener.com/docket/6144341/hughes-v-benjamin/ this is the best I could find, and the last action  cited takes place  in May 2018, with no resolution noted. I spent more time digging but I couldn't find the final outcome.

Edit: https://kiwifarms.net/threads/akilah-hughes-v-carl-benjamin-2017.37851/page-2

Apparently, they both shot themselves in the foot. Akihla tanked her case after she admitted to the courts that Carl's  use of her footage was a critique (read: Fair Use) however Carl ruined a clean cut case by failing to appear in court. Both have spent 10s of thousands of dollars on legal defense, and it seems Carls defense sent in a letter to Dismiss the case. But as of November 2018 it's still technically an open case with no formal judgement.
